name: CyBer//zDvAc.
description:
A robot, who is about to get destroyed but has a chance to save itself by answering suitors' questions, is trying to get enough points to get married in a TV show called "CyBer//zDvAc." (\ˈsī-bərˈēz-dēˈwäch\) , like "The Bachelor/Bachelorette" from humans' days. Oh, and you are the robot.

[The experience that you will have depends on the words that you put in this game. The choice of your words are all your responsibility.]

team

Artist: Can Başdoğan
Programming: Nabi Hamdi Mortan
Scenario: Esen Andiç-Mortan / Nabi Hamdi Mortan

more

Created with Fungus Unity for CyberPunkJam 2.0 in 2 weeks.

Musics are Babylon & Long Stroll by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Tutorials of Alan Zucconi (www.alanzucconi.com) helped me to create the screen shaders/monitor effect in this game.

Playable with 15 custom words & against eight robot suitors and their custom question types and custom positive responses, in total of 16 questions, eight question each time, You can even play over and over again!

localization

Türkçe - CyBer//zDvAç
